Full text search for names of institutions

Source: R/query.R
institutions_search.Rd

Full text search for names of institutions

Usage

institutions_search(search_term)

Arguments

search_term

token query, phrase query or NEAR query (see http://www.sqlite.org/fts5.html)

Value

tibble with matching results

Examples

 institutions_search("^Stockholm AND University")
#> Warning: No database available at /home/runner/.config/institutions/grid.db please use institutions_download() first
#> Downloading data from https://ndownloader.figshare.com/files/30895309
#> Generating db, storing at /home/runner/.config/institutions/grid.db
#> Generating Full Text Search index
#> # A tibble: 3 × 15
#>   institu…¹ grid_id line_1 line_2 line_3   lat   lng postc…² primary city  state
#>   <chr>     <chr>   <chr>  <chr>   <int> <dbl> <dbl> <chr>     <int> <chr> <chr>
#> 1 Stockhol… grid.1… NA     NA         NA  59.4  18.1 NA            0 Stoc… NA   
#> 2 Stockhol… grid.4… NA     NA         NA  59.3  18.1 NA            0 Stoc… NA   
#> 3 Stockhol… grid.5… NA     NA         NA  59.2  17.9 NA            0 Hudd… NA   
#> # … with 4 more variables: state_code <chr>, country <chr>, country_code <chr>,
#> #   geonames_city_id <dbl>, and abbreviated variable names ¹​institutes,
#> #   ²​postcode
 institutions_search(tolower("Royal Institute of Technology"))
#> # A tibble: 1 × 15
#>   institu…¹ grid_id line_1 line_2 line_3   lat   lng postc…² primary city  state

#> 1 Royal In… grid.5… NA     NA         NA  59.3  18.1 NA            0 Stoc… NA   
#> # … with 4 more variables: state_code <chr>, country <chr>, country_code <chr>,
